message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your understanding of the value. However, I can't go below $15,000. This is a very competitive price for what the product offers.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately I am unable to meet it. I would like to make a counteroffer at $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
